content: a knitted cashmere scrunchie is a luxurious accessory combining practicality of a traditional scrunchie with the indulgence of high-quality cashmere without pulling our damaging your hair it will for sure add a touch of elegance to any hairstyle fun easy and fast to knit you will have created a new favorite accessory in no time **gauge ** 22 sts x 26 rnds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in stockinette sts using 4 mm us6 needles **needles ** 4 mm us6 circular needles **yarn ** 10g cardiff cashmere classic 100 % cashmere - 112 m / 122 yds / 25 g color neve **notions ** one regular thin rubber hairband stitch marker tapestry needle
